docs: i will sure be back again next year .the area suits me fine as it is very quiet at nightso a peaceful nights sleep , but i am only 15 minutes by car to downtown or music city , without paying downtown prices and the noise that goes with it .the staff here are always excellent and can not do enough to make your stay perfect , i was given a room at the end of a corridor that lessens passing traffic and is perfect for a long stay .the candlewood pantry is excellent with coffee available </DOC> ( it only took 15 mins to drive downtown ) .so slept great all three nightsi was there .plenty of nice places to eat within walking distance if you do n't want to use your car .i always use this hotel as my base to visit nashville ( 10 minutes by car ) and the surrounding area and it is one of the lowest rates for a hotel of this quality i have found in the area . </DOC> if you can get an odd number room they face the back of the hotel and have a great view .i planned my trip to nashville late and could not get in the hie downtown as it was fully booked so decided to stay out of town and enjoy the much lower cost , but the quality of this hotel was greatthe gym facilities were good and the honesty shop where you help yourself to items of food etc and log it down was great for getting my cereal , milk and yoghurt for breakfast .great free wi fi and free coffee availablei personally will be back as i feel the reduced costs give a bigger benefit than staying nearer to nashville . </DOC> there are plenty of food options and shopping nearby and downtown nashville is only a 15 minute drive from the hotel .i would highly recommend candlewood suites in brentwood .i will stay there again for my next visit to nashville .this is in a great quite location with easy access to shopping and the highways .you can walk to many locations in a very safe area . </DOC> brentwood is also conveniently located just 10 min from nashville .we will definitely stay here again .get the 1 bdrm suite !had to change rooms once - the first room smelled like smoke .i would recommend it for a business stay in the area . </DOC> all the way .there are sidewalksand i got my walk on .this hotel is fabulous !the front desk staff , especially anna , & the " night laundry " guy joshua who checked us in the first night was awesome ! </DOC> it 's great having a full size kitchen in your room at all candlewood suites .friendly staff , efficient check in and the room was fine .this hotel is close to many restaurants , as well as close to i -65 .it is inexpensive in an expensive part of town .i would stay here again , as the location and pricing works well for me . </DOC> the area felt very safe .this particular hotel is located in a nice quiet business park in suburban brentwood .nashville is a short 15 minute drive via hwy or surface streets .there are a number of quick dining options nearby .one sit down restaurant nearby called mere bulles is terrific and worth a definite visit .
summary: the hotel is nice and quiet .i would definitely stay here again .the location is great , easy to get to from the highway and is close to the highway .i will definitely stay here again .we will stay there again !</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
